title: Medicare Rates Shock Sparks $100 Billion Selloff in Insurers
description: The selloff in health insurers that provide Medicare Advantage plans wiped out nearly $100 billion in stock-market value on Tuesday, even as US equities climbed to fresh highs.
content: The selloff in health insurers that provide Medicare Advantage plans wiped out nearly $100 billion in stock-market value on Tuesday, even as US equities climbed to fresh highs.
